data.title: glog.database Properties
data.text:
Specify the password of the HDOWNER user in the Transportation Intelligence/Global Trade Intelligence database.

This is required for Transportation Intelligence/Global Trade Intelligence setup and to run/scheduleÂ Run ETL. See alsoÂ glog.fti PropertiesÂ andÂ glog.odi Properties.

Note: To protect hosted systems, these properties cannot be modified in the cloud without a service request.

Â

Specify the port that Oracle is using on the Oracle Transportation Intelligence/Global Trade Intelligence database server.

This is required for Transportation Intelligence/Global Trade Intelligence setup.

Note: To protect hosted systems, these properties cannot be modified in the cloud without a service request.

Â

Oracle Transportation Intelligence/Global Trade Intelligence database user name. An example and the default is HDOWNER.

This is required for Transportation Intelligence/Global Trade Intelligence setup and to run/scheduleÂ Run ETL. See alsoÂ glog.fti PropertiesÂ andÂ glog.odi Properties.

Note: To protect hosted systems, these properties cannot be modified in the cloud without a service request.

Â
